name: Egghead The Talking Menace
description:
TALK TO MR MENACE!!!!! THE MAN WHO MURDERED 3 PEOPLE HIMSELF!!!!!!!!

YOU CAN FEED HIM AND MAKE HIM DANCE!!!!

YOU CAN ALSO PUNCH HIM AND STEP ON HIS TOES IF YOURE FEELING A BIT MEANER...

WITH EGGHEAD'S BEST FRIEND: TOUPE!

YOU CAN INTERACT AND ASK HIM QUESTIONS!

HE HAS A TOTAL OF 8 RESPONSES, THOSE BEING:

Yes

Mostly

A Little

Maybe

Not Alot

Mostly Not

No

AND GIBBERISH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

HAVE FUN!!!!!!!!!!!!!

SHOUTOUT TO Tabbi#2775 FOR BEING THE FIRST TO GET SHRUB LEGIT!!!!!!
